text: Bruno Thibout (born 8 May 1969) is a French former professional racing cyclist. He rode in three editions of the Tour de France, three editions of the Vuelta a España and two editions of the Giro d'Italia. Having ridden for the Castorama, Motorola and Cofidis teams, in retirement he has worked as a motorbike rider for the ASO during the Tour de France. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:French male cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Seine-Maritime Category:Giro d'Italia cyclists Category:Tour de France cyclists Category:Vuelta a España cyclists
title: Bruno Thibout
